thread.title: Teen charged with murder of Richard Miskelly in Newtownards
thread.title_full: Teen charged with murder of Richard Miskelly in Newtownards

title: Teen charged with murder of Richard Miskelly in Newtownards
text:
Teen charged with murder of Richard Miskelly in Newtownards 27 February 2017 Close share panel Image copyright Miskelly family Image caption Richard Miskelly died on the roadside after he was attacked at a house in Newtownards A teenager has been charged with the murder of a 24-year-old man who died after a weekend assault in Newtownards, County Down. 
Richard Miskelly was attacked at a house on Bangor Road in the town during the early hours of Sunday, and later died on the roadside. 
Police investigating the killing have charged a 19-year-old man with murder and perverting the course of justice. 
The accused is due before Newtownards Magistrates' Court on Tuesday morning. Second attack 
A second 19-year-old man, who was also arrested on suspicion of murder, was released unconditionally in relation to the killing. 
However, he was also questioned about an attack on a 27-year-old man in the Bangor Road on Sunday morning and a file has been sent to the Public Prosecution Service in relation to that assault. Image copyright Pacemaker Image caption A forensic tent was set up at the scene of the murder on Sunday 
The attack on Mr Miskelly was reported to police at about 05:30 GMT on Sunday. 
He was found lying on the road and was treated by ambulance staff, but died at the scene a short time later.
